name: Hive Jump (Canceled)
blurb: STARSHIP TROOPERS & CONTRA had a baby and we call it HIVE JUMP, a multi-player sci-fi action shooter for your PC & MAC!

rewards.reward: No Reward
-=CITIZEN=- Your name will be listed on our backers page at hivejump.com.

-=FIRST TO FIGHT=-
LIMITED QUANTITY
• Get the game on release!
• (1) PC Key / MAC Key
• (All the above rewards)

-=PRIVATE FIRST CLASS=-
• Digital copy of the Game Soundtrack
• Digital Concept Art Pack including concepts and sketches that inspired the game!
• (All the above rewards)

-=LANCE CORPORAL=- 
• Closed Beta Access allowing you to play before release!
• Access to the Private Developer forum to help us improve the game!
• Special Rank on our Private Developer Forum.
• Digital Art Book including Concepts, Game Art and more!
• (All the above rewards)

-=ELITE CORPORAL=- \u2022 NEW TIER!!! Share Hive Jump with your friends using a unique recruiting key, and receive all CORPORAL tier ($30) rewards. RECRUITING KEY APPLIES TO ALL BACKERS $30 AND ABOVE!

• (1) PC / MAC Key (in addition to the key given at earlier tiers)

• (All the above rewards)
